alert.note: Alert for Dubuque; Jackson; Jones (Iowa) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS QuadCities (Eastern Iowa and Northwestern Illinois - Quad Cities)
info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued July 23 at 3:00AM CDT until July 23 at 3:15AM CDT by NWS QuadCities
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 315 AM CDT FOR SOUTHWESTERN JACKSON...SOUTH CENTRAL DUBUQUE AND NORTHEASTERN JONES COUNTIES... At 300 AM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Temple Hill, or 17 miles northwest of Maquoketa, moving east at 30 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Monmouth, Bernard, Nashville, Canton, Baldwin, Emeline, South Gary Owen, Garry Owen, Fillmore, Maquoketa Caves State Park, Crab Town, Ironhills and Washington Mills. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
